scenario.name: branch_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:CA.cym.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: ua1 <sip:ua1@nnl.cym:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag07[call_number] To: ua1 <sip:ua1@nnl.cym:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:ua1@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0 Expires: 300

INVITE sip:ua2@CA.cym.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: ua[call_number] <sip:ua1@nnl.cym:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag07b[call_number] To: ua2 <sip:ua2@nnl.cym:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:ua1@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:ua2@CA.cym.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: ua1 <sip:ua1@nnl.cym:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag07b[call_number] To: ua2 <sip:ua2@nnl.cym:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:ua1@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:ua2@CA.cym.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: ua1 <sip:ua1@nnl.cym:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag07b[call_number] To: ua2 <sip:ua2@nnl.cym:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:ua1@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
